name: ShroomEater
description:
Made for theme "Mushroom/Nature/Masses"

Webgl version fixed, you can  save your scores now :)

A little game, with leaderboard made using Playfab.

Game save your stats base on your pc id,  so if you'll play again it will save better score and if you'll type other name next time it'll be replaced no mater if you have more or less points, so you can change your name.

Controls:

WSAD or Controller(tested with xboxOneController) - move
